SELECT CATALOG_ITEM_ID catalogItemid, UP_CATALOG_ITEM_ID upCatalogItemId, CATALOG_ITEM_NAME catalogItemName, CATALOG_ID catalogId, CATALOG_ITEM_DESC catalogItemDesc, CATALOG_ITEM_TYPE catalogItemType, CATALOG_ITEM_CD catalogItemCd, CATALOG_LEVEL catalogLevel, SEQ_ID seqId, ICON_URL iconUrl, USE_STATUS useStatus, PATH_NAME pathName, 'closed' state, '0' isNode FROM CATALOG_ITEM WHERE (UP_CATALOG_ITEM_ID is null or UP_CATALOG_ITEM_ID = '')
CATALOG_ID=#catalogId#

SELECT CATALOG_ITEM_ID catalogItemid, gi.UP_CATALOG_ITEM_ID upCatalogItemId, CATALOG_ITEM_NAME catalogItemName, CATALOG_ID catalogId, CATALOG_ITEM_DESC catalogItemDesc, CATALOG_ITEM_TYPE catalogItemType, CATALOG_ITEM_CD catalogItemCd, CATALOG_LEVEL catalogLevel, SEQ_ID seqId, ICON_URL iconUrl, USE_STATUS useStatus, PATH_NAME pathName, decode(childnode.num,null,'','closed') state, decode(childnode.num,null,'1','0') isNode FROM CATALOG_ITEM gi LEFT JOIN (SELECT UP_CATALOG_ITEM_ID,count(*) num FROM CATALOG_ITEM GROUP BY UP_CATALOG_ITEM_ID) childnode ON childnode.UP_CATALOG_ITEM_ID = gi.CATALOG_ITEM_ID
gi.UP_CATALOG_ITEM_ID=#upCatalogItemId#
